about_the_game:
The magical room is about to get even better!

Now you can:
- watch five great new stories: Gulliver in the Country of the Lilliputians, Journey to the Center of the Earth, Captain Fracassie, Many Miles Under the Sea and Treasure Island;
- shoot soap bubbles from a cool bubble gun;
- play with new toys;
- draw with colored pencils;
- turn off gravity and see what happens when ordinary objects become weightless – you can’t do that in a real-life playroom!
detailed_description:
The magical room is about to get even better!

Now you can:
- watch five great new stories: Gulliver in the Country of the Lilliputians, Journey to the Center of the Earth, Captain Fracassie, Many Miles Under the Sea and Treasure Island;
- shoot soap bubbles from a cool bubble gun;
- play with new toys;
- draw with colored pencils;
- turn off gravity and see what happens when ordinary objects become weightless – you can’t do that in a real-life playroom!
name: Magic Lantern DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 equivalent or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980, AMD R9-290x or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The magical room is about to get even better!
